Keywords: Assassin , Cosmic , Guardians of the Galaxy , Infinity Watch , Warrior
Real Name: Gamora
Special Powers
A PIECE OF ME IS MISSING...: At the beginning of your turn, if a friendly character was not targeted with Outwit since your last turn, heal Gamora 1 click. // When a friendly character is targeted with Outwit, gain 1 MISSION POINT.
YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO INTERFERE... WHEN YOU ARE CHAINED TO EACH OTHER: STOP. When this click is first revealed, after resolutions give all opposing characters within 6 squares an action token.

February 7, 2022
Poison1981
top of the dial is nice, and that outwit heal is extremely underrated. Btw, Goop, a. I have seen games where someone is using outwit continuously to pin down an annoying figure, like the Scarlet Witch from this set. Also, there are other mission point characters she could easily pair with, so that it doesnt take "20 outwits". I would argue this is one of the better mission points skills out there, since it only requires someone to use one of the most powerful offensive skills in the game on you. Compare that to the convoluted paths to mission points most of the other mission point characters have....

December 7, 2021
Goop
if you got outwitted 20 times chances are you've lost the game already. Anyway the rest of her dial is pretty good. Decent stats and powers the whole way down with a solid stop click. If your opponent doesn't have any outwit, healing past that stop click over and over can be a pain for them. I dont like that Charge/EE combination in middle though.
